name: Space Fighter Simulation
description:
What is it?

This is not a game but more an idea, I wanted to explore this a little more and see the reactions, and if anyone would want this in a game.

Future Plans?

If the Prototype gets enough attention and gets good results, i will develop this into a game, but if not, this is the final release.

Cost?

Completely free. 

Controls

W - Move Free Cam Forward

A - Move Free Cam Left

S - Move Free Cam Back

D - Move Free Cam Right

Q - Move Free Cam Down

E - Move Free Cam Up

R - Reset Game

F - Show/Hide FPS

U - Show/Hide UI

Space - Free Cam/Auto Cam
